stimulusHtml: Expanding popular culture during the period of the advertisement was most directly accompanied by which of the following changes?

features.html:
Magazine advertisement from 1924

Courtesy of Duke University Libraries Digital Collections

choicesHtml: The federal government relaxed previous restrictions on immigration.
Civil rights activists achieved some legal victories over segregation.
Social tensions intensified over gender roles, race, and modern values.
Liberalism reached a high point of acceptance in national politics.
